page.title: 15A modern hotel for tourists.
page.content: Recently the Crown Hotel was bought by the Shire Inns group. The new owners have made the Crown into a superb new hotel which not only attracts fishermen but also tourists from all over the world. There is now a leisure complex which includes squash courts, saunas,snooker and pool tables and other games facilities.There is a large conference centre which can also be used for wedding receptions, barbecues and parties.The hotel has made use of its situation and organises trips for guests to the Lake District, the Borders and the Eden Valley. The Crown still plays an important and active part in village life. It helps raise money for local and national charities, serves family bar lunches and one small bar serves as a village pub.
